ygData.subject: RE: lifeleech quest!
ygData.msgSnippet: ... From: Grant Vanderhule [mailto:vandergm@willinet.net] Sent: November 11, 1999 9:48 AM To: shadowknight@onelist.com Subject: [shadowknight] lifeleech quest!
ygData.messageBody:
-----Original Message-----
From: Grant Vanderhule [mailto:vandergm@...]
Sent: November 11, 1999 9:48 AM
To: shadowknight@onelist.com
Subject: [shadowknight] lifeleech quest!


From: Grant Vanderhule <vandergm@...>

try not to reveal too much here, lets see if we can keep the raw details of
the lifeleech quest a secret from the general public as long as possible ;)
i NEVER want to see somebody auctioning "lifeleech spell, 5000 plat" ;p

one thing tho: you WILL need lots of friends helping you by the end, and
just to start the thing you'll need 2000p cash on hand. sounds fun, eh?

Beld Demonblade
Fennin Ro

Sounds kinda like SoulFire for sks except that it's not a sword, this is
very cool indeed =)
As much as everyone wants to details I can understand how you wouldn't want
to give them away.
A few hints couldn't hurt tho hehe...
And perhaps you could tells us just what the spell does, a lifetap
obviously, but just how much life are we talking about here?
